original_text: Now you must agree to obey the Lord, the God that your ancestors worshipped. Turn away from your sins and do the things that please him. Make yourselves separate from the foreign people who live near you. Send away your foreign wives.’
korean_text: 이제 너희 조상들의 하나님 앞에서 죄를 자복하고 그의 뜻대로 행하여 그 지방 사람들과 이방 여인을 끊어 버리라 하니

sentences.original_text: Now you must agree to obey the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 너희는 주를 순종하기로 동의해야 한다

sentences.original_text: the God that your ancestors worshipped
and do the things that please him
Make yourselves separate from the foreign people
